description: System-generated primary key for the privilege target type record; used as the unique identifier in relationships and lookups.
Business identifier or name of the privilege target type, used in UI, rules, and configuration.
Human-readable explanation of the object category the privilege targets and its role in the application.
Timestamp when the record was last changed in the database, regardless of whether the change was user- or system-initiated.
Timestamp of the most recent update performed by an application user (not a system process); likely overlaps with user_date_modifiedâ€”confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user account that originally created this record.
Date and time when the record was first created by a user.
Identifier of the user account that most recently modified this record.
Date and time of the most recent user-initiated modification to this record.
